content:
Also, counting civilian casualties and Cuba’s sporting export

EMMANUEL MACRON, the president of France, was already dealing with national protests when a massive fire broke out at the Notre Dame cathedral , an 850-year old Parisian landmark. Can the tragedy, and Mr Macron’s leadership, bring the country together? America’s armed forces often don’t know how many civilians are killed in its air-strike campaigns—but that’s changing, thanks to pressure from the Pentagon’s loudest critics. And, though the Trump administration has cancelled a deal for Cuban baseball players , that won’t stop them making their way to the big leagues. Runtime: 19 min.

Listen on: Apple Podcasts  |  Spotify  |  Google  |  Stitcher  |  TuneIn

ex: n. 〔机〕缝针；拼逢机；钉箱机；齿形压滚

n. 受害者；遇难者；毁坏物；损坏物
网络 伤亡；伤亡人员；事故
eg2: road casualties
交通事故伤亡人员
Both sides had suffered heavy casualties(= many people had been killed) .
双方都伤亡惨重。
She became a casualty of the reduction in part-time work(= she lost her job) .
她成了裁减兼职工作的受害人。
Small shops have been a casualty of the recession.
小商店在经济萧条中深受其害。
The victims were rushed to casualty.
受伤者被迅速送往急救室。

ex: adj. (像)大教堂的；庄严的

eg2: St Paul's Cathedral
圣保罗大教堂
a cathedral city
有主教座堂的城市

ex: n. 平民；老百姓；庶民

n. 陆标；（标志重要阶段的）里程碑；有历史意义的建筑物（或遗址）
网络 地标；界标；兰德马克
eg2: The Empire State Building is a familiar landmark on the New York skyline.
帝国大厦是人们熟悉的纽约高楼大厦中的地标。
The ceasefire was seen as a major landmark in the fight against terrorism.
停火协定被看作是与恐怖主义斗争的重要里程碑。
a landmark decision/ruling in the courts
具有里程碑意义的决策╱法庭裁决

wp.Viper Strike: 蝮蛇突袭;蝰蛇打击;毒蛇出击;蛇打击

ex: vi. 打，打击；罢工；敲，敲击；抓；打动；穿透

n. (Strike)人名；(英)斯特赖克
eg2: They blacklegged in the last .
在上次罢工中他们当了工贼。
The docker's  tied up the port.
码头工人的罢工使港口陷于瘫痪。
All these circumstances looked to a great .
所有这些情况可能会导致一场大罢工。

transform: struck 或 strook,struck 或 stricken,striking

ex: n. 悲剧；【文】(文学)悲剧
网络 灾难；悲剧片；惨案
eg2: It's a tragedy that she died so young.
她英年早逝是一大悲哀。
Tragedy struck the family when their son was hit by a car and killed.
这个家庭惨遭不幸，他们的儿子被汽车撞死了。
The whole affair ended in tragedy .
整个事件以悲剧而告终。
Shakespeare's tragedies
莎士比亚的悲剧
Greek tragedy
希腊悲剧

Title: The fire in Notre Dame cathedral, and more from our daily podcast
